CustomField.description: The name of the specific implementation class or method that will handle the context retrieval. For Apex implementations, this is the class name that implements the context retrieval interface.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the name of the Apex class that implements the context retrieval logic (e.g., "AccountContextProvider", "CaseHistoryProvider"). The class must implement the required interface.
CustomField.label: Implementation Name
